mdRecord.dcterms:title: Ardella Slusher
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Ardella Slusher (Miss Turner) This photograph is one of the oldest ever printed in the Henry County Journal. It is of the late Mrs. Ardella Howery Slusher (Miss Ardella Turner), of Floyd County, who died in 1966. The picture was taken in 1879. Mrs. Slusher had two daughters - Mrs. Marie H. Dickerson of Floyd and Mrs. John Houchins of Troutville. She was the Grandmother of E. Maynard Lackey of Collinsville, and visited frequently to Henry County.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Pictorial family records
mdRecord.dcterms:provenance: Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University. University Libraries
